title: Question @ Riot about a recent account ban
body: Hi, just needed to ask why my account was banned? The IGN and summoner name is "Sarcodin" region is NA. I never received an email from Riot about being banned, just when logging in says the account is permanently suspended.... Thanks in advance for the help.

replies.body:
Hey Sarcodin, 

For questions about your account, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584). You may have also received an email with more information regarding your ban.

I defend Riot all the time on these boards. However, his question specifically said he didn't receive an email (or at least he didn't see one).  The fact that you included that last sentence makes this seem like a copy + paste response, not actually focusing on what his question is saying.

I can assure you that it's not a copy paste. 

I understand that he said he didn't receive an email; however, sometimes the email may be lost in other emails/spam. It was more of a 'hey, check your email twice just to be sure, and if not, ask Player Support for help regarding your account.
Thanks for the response. I received no emails at all, neither spam nor anywhere else. When I try to log in it mentions that an email was sent but.... never got one.
Hmm, okay. Shoot a ticket over to Player Support, and they'll be able to hook you up with more info regarding your account.

You'd need to contact Player Support for anything regarding your account. They'd be able to explain a bit more why the account was suspended. Keep in mind  that it is rare that we remove bans and suspensions.
Yea i read that and ur not gonna get ur wish.
Make sure that the address you're checking is the one associated with your account - that's a common oversight.

I think that would have been a better way to say it.  It would have seemed less copy+paste.  "Double check your email because you should have received something."  That shows that you are understanding what he's saying.
I agree - sorry for the miscommunication there. I'm going to blame this one on my lack of coffee this morning. Thanks for pointing it out. :D

I wasn't trying to sound angry or like a know-it-all, but I've been looking at new cell phone carriers all week and using their online chat support only having to ask the same question 5 times before I get a non-copy-pasted answer.

Working in customer service, these kinds of things really irk me.
Katey he is lying. He was like totally angry at you. You should beat him up.
whether you deserved the ban or not (know way for us on the boards to know) I hope you find out whats going on!
This thread had a potential to be a shitstorm, but it got defused. Good job.
